member.name: P:AbilityChanger.Ability.name
member.summary: The ability name. It acts as an indentifier for the ability inside the manager. Abilities names must be unique inside each manager

member.name: P:AbilityChanger.Ability.title
member.summary: The ability title shown when displayed inside the inventory

member.name: P:AbilityChanger.Ability.description
member.summary: The description shown inside the inventory

member.name: P:AbilityChanger.Ability.activeSprite
member.summary: The sprite shown in the inventory

member.name: P:AbilityChanger.Ability.abilityType
member.summary: The name of the ability it'll replace/ name of the manager where it'll be contained

member.name: M:AbilityChanger.Ability.hasAbility
member.summary: The method that controlls if the ability can be use bt AC. Default behaviour is to point to aquiredAbility

member.name: P:AbilityChanger.Ability.aquiredAbility
member.summary: The flag AC uses to save wheter the ability was aquired in the save file

member.name: M:AbilityChanger.Ability.setAquireAbility(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: The method called aquire/unaquire abilities at gametime. If your ability was the first aquiried on the save (including the vannila one) it'll be auto selected regardless of autoselect
member.param: true/false => aquired/unaquired
if the ability should be autoselected on aquired

member.name: F:AbilityChanger.Ability.OnSelect
member.summary: Delegate called everytime your ability is selected. All changes wanted should be registered here.

member.name: F:AbilityChanger.Ability.OnUnselect
member.summary: Delegate called everytime your ability is unselected. Changes made in manager's FSM are automatically reset while changes made in script/script base managers MUST be undone here. Changes made in the environment, like destroying GameObjects, should be done here

member.name: F:AbilityChanger.Ability.relatedAbilities
member.summary: You can asks AC to switch other abilities (custom or not) when switching to your ability. The format is { abilityType: AbilityName}

member.name: F:AbilityChanger.AbilityChanger.ManagersMap
member.summary: Dictionary that holds every ability manager

member.name: M:AbilityChanger.AbilityChanger.RegisterAbility(AbilityChanger.Ability)
member.summary: Register a new ability for the given ability type
member.param: An Ability

member.name: M:AbilityChanger.AbilityChanger.DeregisterAbility(AbilityChanger.Ability)
member.summary: Deregister an ability from ability changer
member.param: An Ability

member.name: M:AbilityChanger.ComponentExtensions.CloneFsm(UnityEngine.GameObject,PlayMakerFSM)
member.summary: Clones a PlayMakerFSM and adds it to the GO
member.param: The GameObject which will hold the cloned FSM
The PlayMakerFSM to clone
member.returns: Returns a reference to the cloned PMFSM

member.name: M:AbilityChanger.Base.CycloneSlash.ReplaceSpawn(UnityEngine.GameObject,System.Nullable{UnityEngine.Vector3})
member.summary: Replaces the GameObject spawned when cyclone starts
member.param: the GamewObject to be spawned
The position it should spawn. If not provided, spaws at the Knight's current position

member.name: M:AbilityChanger.Base.CycloneSlash.OnTrigger(System.Action,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Register an action to be called when the ability would start
member.param: the action to call
if the default behaviour should continue after

member.name: M:AbilityChanger.Base.CycloneSlash.DuringSlash(System.Action)
member.summary: Register an action to be called every fixed frame during cyclone's slashing animation and extended animation

member.name: T:AbilityChanger.Base.CycloneSlash.states
member.summary: The FSM states Ability Changer considers belong to this Ability and expects to be modified without repercutions. Shared states between abilities can be accessed withing the Base.CommonStates namespace, changes in those states can affect other abilities and should be done with care

member.name: M:AbilityChanger.Base.Dash.OnTrigger(System.Func{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Register an action to be called when the dash button is pressed.
member.param: The action to be called. It must return true if it wants the default behaviour to continue, false if it doesn't

member.name: M:AbilityChanger.Base.Dash.OnDashing(System.Func{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Register an action to be called every frame while dashing
member.param: The action to be called. It must return true if it wants the default behaviour to continue, false if it doesn't
